text: Anante ruotage'ma hu'na'a ankerontre'ma mani'nampintira magomo'a amanage huno magomofona antahige'ne. Ke ontahi havi avu'ava zama ama ava'nagna zampima fore hia zantamina nama'a kna maniteno vagaregahie? Ana hanige'za vahe'mo'za ina zupa ete eri agafa hu'za mago mago zupama huterema nehaza ofa hugahaze? Ina zupa ana pazivemofo hankavea vagaresnigeno, Monafi sondia vahetamima zamazeri haviza nehuno, mono noma agiareti'ma eri havizama nehia zamo'a vagaregahie?
